title: Plumber discovers human flesh of teen girl in bathroom pipes
itunes:title: Plumber discovers human flesh of teen girl in bathroom pipes
description:
Plumbers are called to a rental home to unclog drains. As they snake the pipes, the material pulled out is unnerving enough that the police are called. When police knock on a tenant's door, he confesses it's a body. Adam Strong is now on trial for murder.


Joining Nancy Grace today:

  • Ashley Willcott - Judge and trial attorney, Anchor on Court TV, www.ashleywillcott.com 
  • Psych - Caryn Stark - NYC Psychologist, www.carynstark.com 
  • Joe Scott Morgan - Professor of Forensics Jacksonville State University, Author, "Blood Beneath My Feet" featured on "Poisonous Liaisons" on True Crime Network
  • Nicole Partin - Crime Online Investigative Reporter

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
